sentences.sContent: As Cinderella sits crying in the garden, her fairy godmother appears, and promised to provide Cinderella with everything she needs to go to the ball, but only on two conditions.
sentences.sContent_eng: As Cinderella sits crying in the garden, her fairy godmother appears, and promised to provide Cinderella with everything she needs to go to the ball, but only on two conditions.
sentences.sCn: 灰姑娘在花园里伤心的哭泣，这时她的精灵教母出现了，答应给她提供她参加舞会所需的一切，但有两个条件。

sentences.sContent: In the case of Roman Catholics, the parents of the child will select a godfather and a godmother and this will be announced at the ceremony.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the case of Roman Catholics, the parents of the child will select a godfather and a godmother and this will be announced at the ceremony.
sentences.sCn: 如若是罗马天主教徒，父母就会为孩子选择一位教父和一位教母，并会在仪式上将此事进行宣布。

phrases.pCn: n. 充当临死孩童教母的仙女

trans.tranCn: 当…的教母；作…的女监护人
